title: Twitter Engineering Manager Leslie Miley Leaves Company Because Of Diversity Issues
description: Twitter Engineering Manager Leslie Miley, one of the few black engineers in a leadership position at Twitter, just publicly announced that he has left the company. In his post, he says his reasons for leaving have everything to do with the way Twitter is addressing diversity and inclusion. Read More
